data.title: How Bluey Became a $2 Billion Smash Hit—With an Uncertain Future
data.meta_description: The Australian children’s show auteur Joe Brumm is at a crossroads: Keep growing, or end one of the best runs on TV.
data.text:
The Australian children’s show auteur Joe Brumm is at a crossroads: Keep growing, or end one of the best runs on TV.

High above the masses pressed against police barricades, Joe Brumm stood by a window on the fifth floor of a New York office building, watching the balloons go by. It was the Macy’s Thanksgiving Day Parade in 2022, and there was Pikachu, riding in a sleigh. Baby Yoda, bundled in a heavy overcoat. Papa Smurf. Snoopy clad in a stylish astronaut’s outfit.
